long_description: Extreme Sport Beans, from the makers of Jelly Belly beans, have 50mg of caffeine to give you that extra boost during your workout. Simply explained, Extreme Sport Beans are jelly beans formulated with carbohydrates, caffeine, electrolytes and vitamins B and C. Eat one packet about 30 min. before exercising. During a long workout, eat additional beans to sustain energy. Eat after a workout to replenish muscles of depleted carbohydrates. Not recommended for children, teens or pregnant or nursing women. Specifications based on a range of flavors; nutrition facts displayed here and on wrapper may differ; information on wrapper reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Extreme Sport Beans, from the makers of Jelly Belly beans, have 50mg of caffeine to give you that extra boost during your workout.
